text:
"After Hours" is the seventh studio album by Canadian recording artist The Weeknd. It was released on March 20, 2020, by XO and Republic Records.
The album broke the record for most pre-adds on Apple Music before release, with over one million pre-adds on the streaming service.
Singles.
Two singles have been released from the album: "Heartless" and "Blinding Lights". The first was released on November 27, 2019, and the second was released two days later. “Heartless” became the singer’s fourth number-one song on the "Billboard" Hot 100 in the United States.
"Blinding Lights" became his fifth U.S. number-one, also breaking the record for most weeks in the top five of the "Billboard" Hot 100, with 28 weeks there so far. It also broke the record for most weeks at the top of the Hot 100 Airplay chart.
"In Your Eyes" was released as a remix with American recording artist Doja Cat on May 20, 2020. Another remix with saxophonist Kenny G was released October 16, 2020. The album version of the song reached number 16 on the US Hot 100.
